name: PerfectEarTraining
0:
”Alexa open perfect ear training”
”give me a note”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: perfect ear training
des:
Perfect Ear Training is an easier, faster, and more fun way to learn how to hear a note and recognize its note name. 

You start the skill by saying, "Alexa start perfect ear training."

If you want to start playing immediately, just say, "give me a note" and Alexa will give you a C or a B note..

When you're ready for harder notes, say, "Set skill level to 3" or 4 or 5. Currently, you'll have to do this every time you play the game, but in the very near future, Alexa will remember your choice.

If you want to make it easier, say "Set skill level to 1"

You can also change instruments:
For Sine Waves say, "Change instrument to sine waves"
For Piano say, "Change instrument to piano"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
